divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the Ball park watching the Hod Rods when the fireworks display was starting. That is when I first saw this. It was like a small light. I ignored it and then it caught my attention becoming closer and looking like a hot air balloon and then it became further and then turned into a light again.. I showed my grandfather and he too thought it was odd. We left the game and on the way home we saw it again. It was a light, kind of amber orange, then it was near the moon and moved above it and then it changed into two strobing lights that blinked and moved rapidly in a strange pattern. It disappard once we went through some heavy trees and we did not see it again.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Bowling Green
There were no other sightings in Bowling Green on or around August 28th 2009
Summary: The UFO was at first a light then changed into balloon like w/ light then changed again into just a light disappearing and reappearing later
